Articles.Content:
Well it essentially was made for a friend who just purchased the game and he needed some help in KSP with mostly docking and such

So as problems occur I plan to made more videos or if time permits on a timely basis (like a small progressive series) .

Any feedback, or improvement ideas will be welcomed

Thanks Again for any comments or ideas!!

All seems pretty good, however do you use a pop filter? You can make one with pantyhose and a wire coat hanger, or head out to a music store and pick one fairly cheaply. All told a very good first video

I do not use one, but that seems like a good purchase.

thanks for the feedback!!!
